## Preparation of the working environment

:::{.incremental}
1. Create an account on the [SSP Cloud](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/home) using your professional mail address
2. From the [Automation](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/catalog/automation) catalog, launch a `MLflow` service
3. From the [Interactive services](https://datalab.sspcloud.fr/catalog/ide) catalog, launch a `Vscode-python` service
4. In `VSCode`, open a terminal and clone the training repository : <br/>
`git clone https://github.com/InseeFrLab/formation-mlops.git`
5. In the terminal, move the current directory to the cloned project : <br/>
`cd formation-mlops`
6. You're all set !
:::
